products.title: Genesis White Roller Blind
products.description: A stunning accent for any interior style, this delightful white blind will refresh your space with its tranquil white colourway. Dress any window with the genesis white roller blind and whether it is in a bathroom, hallway or kitchen, the simple style will enhance the sense of openness in the room whilst offering the privacy you need. products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe White Roller Blind
products.description: The genesis blackout luxe white roller blind with its crisp white colour and simple design is a breath of fresh air for any space. The attractive, natural weave effect fabric is backed with a colour match blackout coating and can be lowered via the smooth rolling function to give optimum privacy and shade in an easy movement. products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look.
